title: Peach Crumble

filling: 6 c sliced fresh or frozen peaches

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°. Toss peaches with sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Pour into 9x13 baking dish. For topping: Mix flour, oats, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Cut in butter until crumbly. Sprinkle over peaches. Bake 40-45 minutes until golden and bubbly. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
